title: Make a stop at El Parque Villas! Two Bedroom Two Bathroom availability
posting_body: ['El Parque Villas', '5001 El Parque Ave, Las Vegas, NV, 89146', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to your new home at El Parque Villas in Las Vegas, NV', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 900 - 940 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'El Parque Villas invites you to start your new Las Vegas lifestyle.', 'Find yourself embracing an apartment community that is full of endless opportunities for entertainment, and relaxation.', 'Our apartments for rent in Las Vegas, give you the perfect combination of comfort at home, and convenience to be out on the town.', "Here you'll find stunning features and a spectacular location.", 'We offer 1 & 2 bedroom floor plans that bring you everything you need at your fingertips.', 'Come home to our Las Vegas apartments, and experience the first-hand comfort, and amenities built just for you.', 'Dive into life at a location that is nestled near all of the top local attractions.', 'Our Las Vegas apartments for rent will bring you the beauty of nearby scenery, and the convenience of your local neighborhood.', 'Come enjoy the benefits of city-life, combined with the rewards of high-class apartment living.', 'Make El Parque Villas in Las Vegas, NV your home, and join our community today.', 'Features', '- Window Coverings', '- Open Kitchens', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', '- Private Balconies/Patios', '- Carpeted Floors', '- Extra Storage', '- Air Conditioning', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness Center', '- Private Backyards/Patios', '- Access to Public Transportation', '- Easy Access to Freeways', '- Swimming Pool', '- Picnic Area with Barbecue', '- 24-Hour Laundry Facility', '- Easy Access to Shopping', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, please contact leasing office.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'L223ZjT5K']
